About Me

BIO

Hello!
My name is Raul, I live in Delicias, MX.
I spent around 17 years in the automation engineering field. During my time as project lead, I noticed that software development and technology are an essential part of me. As project lead, I had no time for getting more involved, technically speaking. So, I decided to change to become a software developer. And here I am.
Want to have a talk about technology, software, construction or just hang? Contact Me!
